titleStmt.title: Some few questions concerning the Oath of allegiance propos'd by a Catholick gentleman in a letter to a person of learning and honour.
titleStmt.author: Walsh, Peter, 1618?-1688.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Peter Walsh by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
